title: How to Set Unlimited Cash in Command & Conquer Generals and Zero Hour

steps.title: Navigate to C:
steps.content: Navigate to C: \Documents and Settings\YourUserName\My Documents\Command & Conquer Generals Zero Hour Data\

steps.title: Use Notepad or any other text editor.
steps.content: Use Notepad or any other text editor.

steps.title: If you don't see it then just add a line at the end:
steps.content: If you don't see it then just add a line at the end: "StartingCash = your amount" The line should look like: "StartingCash = 10000". The value could differ.

steps.title: Put it as high as you want.
steps.content: Put it as high as you want. If you do set the value too high then when you start the game you will see -1 as your starting cash. In this condition you have unlimited cash.

steps.title: Press Create Game.
steps.content: Press Create Game. You will see the default 10000 starting cash. Don't worry; it's okay.

steps.title: Now you will have the cash you set in the Network.ini File.
steps.content: Now you will have the cash you set in the Network.ini File. Enjoy!
